ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the new PointMarker API in SciChart 2.0. Now built-in types handle Ellipse, Square, Cross, Triangle markers and a special type allows for UIElements to be rendered to bitmap at data-point values (SpriteMarker).
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates the [url='http://support.scichart.com/index.php?/Knowledgebase/Article/View/17182/28/adding-data-pointmarkers']PointMarker API[/url] which allows data-point markers to be added to many RenderableSeries types.
Now built-in types handle Ellipse, Square, Cross, Triangle, Inverted Triangle, X markers and a special type allows for UIElements to be rendered to bitmap at data-point values (SpriteMarker), so it's possible to render tens or hundreds of thousands of point-markers using this method.
It is also possible to create custom PointMarkers by overriding BasePointMarker.InternalDraw using our RenderContext API.
